item.title: My web3 stack
item.description: It’s been almost two years since I jumped full-time into the web3 space. Over time, I’ve refined the tools I use to optimize for productivity MacOs Apps # VSCode (duh) Warp - Terminal Bruno - Git-based API Client (Postman Alternative) DevUtils - Swiss-army knife of tools (Base64, SVG, JSON, JWT decode/conversions) Mockoon - Mock an API in seconds Postico 2 - Postgres Client Medis - Redis Client Frontend Libraries # Viem NextJs Tailwindcss Backend #Mostly project dependent but here are some of my defaults
